column9: ethnicity.name ethnicity FROM `families` LEFT JOIN `settings` relationship_1 ON relationship_1_id = relationship_1.id LEFT JOIN `settings` relationship_2 ON relationship_2_id = relationship_2.id LEFT JOIN `settings` language ON language_id = language.id LEFT JOIN `settings` who_called ON who_called_id = who_called.id LEFT JOIN `settings` family_heard ON family_heard_id = family_heard.id LEFT JOIN `settings` call_reason ON call_reason_id = call_reason.id LEFT JOIN `settings` race ON race_id = race.id LEFT JOIN `settings` ethnicity ON ethnicity_id = ethnicity.id WHERE 1  AND (hmg_worker = "RobinL" AND language_id = "86") ORDER BY last_name_1 ASC
